zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，谨慎观望]
zh.content:
当前AVAX/USD在11.7251附近交易，24小时内小幅上涨0.40%。近期价格波动在11.6706至11.7482之间，显示出市场处于震荡整理状态。短期内，价格未能有效突破 SMA(20) 的阻力位11.93209，表明上行压力明显，市场情绪偏向谨慎。

从技术指标来看，MACD处于负值区域，显示出卖方力量依然存在，反弹动能不足。同时，RSI指标未提供，但从当前价格走势来看，市场可能尚未出现超买或超卖的明显信号，投资者应保持警惕。若RSI指标后续出现低于30的超卖信号，可能是买入的机会。

在支撑位方面，11.6706是关键支撑区域，若跌破此位，可能引发进一步回调，目标下探至11.5000。而上方阻力位则集中在11.7482及SMA(20)附近，突破这些阻力位可能会开启新的上涨空间。建议投资者在当前震荡区间内保持观望，待确认的趋势信号再进行操作，以降低风险。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 11.7251, marking a slight upward movement of 0.40% over the past 24 hours. This modest increase suggests that the market is consolidating around this price level after recent fluctuations. The high of 11.7482 indicates a resistance level, while the low of 11.6706 suggests a potential support zone. Traders should monitor these levels closely, as a breakout above resistance could signal further bullish momentum.

The absence of the RSI(14) makes it difficult to gauge overbought or oversold conditions, but the MACD value of -0.13110259 suggests bearish momentum is still present. This implies that while the price is currently stable, the underlying trend remains weak. If the MACD crosses above its signal line in the future, it could indicate a shift towards a more bullish outlook. Traders should be cautious and look for confirmation before entering long positions.

The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at 11.93209 acts as a significant resistance level, with the price currently trading below it. If the price can break above this SMA, it may regain upward momentum and test higher levels. Conversely, if the price falls below the support level of 11.6706, it could trigger further selling pressure, leading to a potential decline. 

Traders are advised to adopt a wait-and-see approach, monitoring both the resistance at the SMA and the support level for signs of a breakout or breakdown. A confirmed move above the recent high of 11.7482 could provide a bullish entry point, while a fall below 11.6706 might warrant caution and a reevaluation of long positions. Risk management strategies should be in place to navigate these key levels effectively.
